column5: Looking for a good place to stop over for the night. This is our midway point and would like some good ideas as where to stay the night in Nipigon or close to (no five star needed). Thanks for your help.

Just came thru there Sunday and was looking for the same for future trips. Nipigon River Motel looked OK for an overnight stay. I didn't get a phone # but saw it listed in a listing of motels for Nipigon , Ontario
